body.name: KATIN [2-Pack] Screen Protector For Apple iPhone SE 2020, iPhone 8, iPhone 7, iPhone 6S, iPhone 6 4.7-Inch Tempered Glass, 9H Hardness, Bubble Free, Case Friendly
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 3 hrs 17 mins
features: Screen Protector Specifically Designed for Apple iPhone SE 2020, iPhone 8, iPhone 7, iPhone 6S, iPhone 6 (4.7-inch).
Please Note: Our Screen Protector is made to be a Little Smaller than the Actual Screen of your device and it does not cover about 1/8 inch, Because Smaller size works better with phone case.

Simply remove the protective film and apply it to your screen. Installation only takes a few seconds, Highly durable, and scratch resistant - surface hardness 9H and topped with oleophobic coating to reduce fingerprints. Ultra-clear with 99.9% transparency to allow an optimal, natural viewing experience.
Protected by KATIN No-Hassle Lifetime Replacement Warranty.
Includes: 1x Retail Packing Box, 2x Tempered Glass Screen Protector, 2x Wet wipes / 2x Dry wipes, 2x Dust Removal Stickers and lifetime warranty card.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Question: Why can't the screen protector cover the entire screen? Answer: Because the screen edges of the iPhone 8, 7, 6S, 6, SE 2020 Phone models have a certain curvature, there will be a wide range of bubbles in the full-screen protector, which will affect the appearance of the phone. In response to this problem, KATIN specially designed a slightly smaller iPhone 8, 7, 6S, 6, SE 2020 screen protector, which improves the bubble problem and can be better used with mobile phone cases. Question ：Will it be difficult to install a mobile phone screen protector? Answer： Every customer who buys a product in KATIN will get an instruction manual on how to install the screen protector, which is accompanied by a very intuitive and detailed video. If you have any problems during the installation process, you can let us help you. Question ：The product is cracked or the model is wrong after receiving it? Answer：When you get a broken product, it may be caused by a large squeeze or impact during the long-term transportation. When you receive the wrong product, it may be that the warehouse receives a large amount of goods and the product is in confusion during sorting. Don't worry, Please contact Amazon service in time or get in touch with us via Amazon email following steps: Go to Your Orders, find your order in the list, and click Problem with order. and the problem will be solved well for you. Question ：Why does the edge of the screen protector break after being used for a period of time? Answer：The screen protector is made of AF explosion-proof PET and other materials after heat treatment and tempering, so the surface is hard enough, scratch-resistant, abrasion-resistant, explosion-proof, waterproof, and oil-proof, which can help your phone block daily collisions and scratches. When subjected to a severe impact, the screen protector will replace the mobile phone screen to bear all the impact and break. Within the range that Screen Protector can withstand, it can protect the phone screen from damage when dropped or hit. However , although the hardness of the screen protector is very high, it is very brittle, especially the corners, just like breaking chocolate, the corners are easier to break, which is why the protector will crack in the corners after using it for a period of time. If you want to extend the use time of the protector, you can use it with a mobile phone case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was so easy to apply to my phone, and it works so very well. Dropped it a couple of times my grandbabies dropped it it did crack but it didn't break and I feel so much better that my actual screen is protected this thing is really protecting my phone from breaking the face of it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just replaced my cracked screen. I probably should’ve prepped a bit better before I started, because it’s currently midnight, and I’m watching tv in my dark room with no glasses on. Oh well! I started the process, and had to finish it or waste the screen protector. To my surprise, and delight, I was able to get the screen changed without any problems, even in the dark! I used both the wet and dry towels, and the dust absorption thing, but I couldn’t really understand exactly how to use the guide stickers. I tore the box open and destroyed the instructions in the process (the instructions are printed on the inside of the box), but I still got the screen nice and straight, without any air bubbles. It looks great, and the price was great too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: protects my phone rlly well, i replaced the protector the other day and although the protector was cracked a lot, my phone wasn’t at all!! only issue is that there was some bubbles but only on the sides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good product. Well made. Fits well on the new phone. Bonus that it comes with 2 glass screen protectors. I would buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Goes on smoothly, no bubbles
reviews.reviewText: Title says it all. Inexpensive, easy application, no bubbles. Thumbs up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Leaves bubbles around screen
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these for my boys’ iPhone SE’s. I got one set of two and put them on their phones. Immediately I noticed that they weren’t too sticky and it left a bubble all around the edges. I thought I did it wrong, but went on to place the second one on and it did the same thing. I had them replaced only to have the new ones do the exact same thing. So I will be returning all four. The packaging was good, and there was no visible damage. It’s just a bad product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent price for the product and excellent product. Very easy to install. Literally 15 seconds. Great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great. Just what we needed to refresh screen

reviews.reviewText: Happy with this product. I will never pay $25 at a shop again for tempered glass for i phone. Really easy to use and does the job well

reviews.reviewTitle: Just as described, perfect for peace of mind
reviews.reviewText: Very good value for peace of mind

Bought a pack for my iPhone SE 2020 and the first one already ended up in the bin after like not even a month on because it cracked, the second one has been one for what, 2 weeks? Already chipped.I’ve had much better ones that last at least 6 months before I have to replace them, sorry but I won’t be buying these again.
Easy to instal and very neat

reviews.reviewTitle: Fits but no adhesive to the edge looks awful
reviews.reviewText: Fits but no adhesive to the edge looks awful.Can you send a replacement with glue over the entire glass?
